core.name: Health Potion
core.description: Heals the target character for 1d6 hitpoints

events.onuse: page.warning('%s is using a %s on %s' % (player.displayname(), item.displayname(), target.displayname())
events.onfinish:
from util import rolldice
health = rolldice(numdice=1, numsides=6, modifier=0)
result = target.heal(health)
page.error('%s has been healed for %s, and current hitpoints are %s' % (player.displayname(), health, result)
